author: oheger
msg: Replaced event listener registration methods in FileBasedConfigurationBuilder.
Switched from the deprecated methods to the methods from the EventSource

author: oheger
msg: Replaced event listener registration methods in test class.

author: oheger
msg: BasicConfigurationBuilder now removes event listeners when the result is reset.
The now obsolete configuration object should no longer generate events, even
if it is still referenced and accessed.

author: oheger
msg: As ConfigurationBuilder extends EventSource and now all listeners are
registered via the event source methods, all configuration builders provide a
valid EventSource implementation. Thus, the code in

author: oheger
msg: Fixed some problems with the handling of events from managed builders.
MultiFileConfigurationBuilder was only handling events of type RESET. Now all
builder event types are supported and are propagated to event listeners
